    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/generic/yv12extend.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/vpx_scale_rtcd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_util/vpx_thread.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_util/vpx_write_yuv_frame.c)
set(libvpx_srcs_nacl_assembly)
set(libvpx_srcs_generic
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/alloccommon.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/blockd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/dequantize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/entropy.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/entropymode.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/entropymv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/extend.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/filter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/findnearmv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/generic/systemdependent.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/idct_blk.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/idctllm.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/loopfilter_filters.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/mbpitch.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/mfqe.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/modecont.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/postproc.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/quant_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/reconinter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/reconintra.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/reconintra4x4.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/rtcd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/setupintrarecon.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/swapyv12buffer.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/treecoder.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/vp8_loopfilter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/common/vp8_skin_detection.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/decoder/dboolhuff.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/decoder/decodeframe.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/decoder/decodemv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/decoder/detokenize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/decoder/onyxd_if.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/decoder/threading.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/bitstream.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/boolhuff.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/copy_c.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/dct.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/denoising.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/encodeframe.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/encodeintra.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/encodemb.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/encodemv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/ethreading.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/lookahead.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/mcomp.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/modecosts.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/mr_dissim.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/onyx_if.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/pickinter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/picklpf.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/ratectrl.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/rdopt.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/segmentation.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/tokenize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/treewriter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/encoder/vp8_quantize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/vp8_cx_iface.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp8/vp8_dx_iface.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_alloccommon.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_blockd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_common_data.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_entropy.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_entropymode.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_entropymv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_filter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_frame_buffers.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_idct.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_loopfilter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_mfqe.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_mvref_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_postproc.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_pred_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_quant_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_reconinter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_reconintra.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_rtcd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_scale.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_scan.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_seg_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_thread_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/common/vp9_tile_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/decoder/vp9_decodeframe.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/decoder/vp9_decodemv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/decoder/vp9_decoder.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/decoder/vp9_detokenize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/decoder/vp9_dsubexp.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/decoder/vp9_job_queue.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_aq_cyclicrefresh.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_bitstream.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_context_tree.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_cost.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_dct.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_denoiser.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_encodeframe.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_encodemb.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_encodemv.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_encoder.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_ethread.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_ext_ratectrl.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_extend.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_frame_scale.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_lookahead.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_mcomp.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_multi_thread.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_noise_estimate.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_picklpf.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_pickmode.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_quantize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_ratectrl.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_rd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_rdopt.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_resize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_segmentation.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_skin_detection.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_speed_features.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_subexp.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_svc_layercontext.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_tokenize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/encoder/vp9_treewriter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/vp9_cx_iface.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/vp9_dx_iface.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vp9/vp9_iface_common.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx/src/vpx_codec.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx/src/vpx_decoder.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx/src/vpx_encoder.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx/src/vpx_image.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/add_noise.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/avg.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/bitreader.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/bitreader_buffer.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/bitwriter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/bitwriter_buffer.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/deblock.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/fwd_txfm.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/intrapred.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/inv_txfm.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/loopfilter.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/prob.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/psnr.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/quantize.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/sad.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/skin_detection.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/subtract.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/sum_squares.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/variance.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/vpx_convolve.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_dsp/vpx_dsp_rtcd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_mem/vpx_mem.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/generic/gen_scalers.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/generic/vpx_scale.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/generic/yv12config.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/generic/yv12extend.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_scale/vpx_scale_rtcd.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_util/vpx_thread.c
    ${VPX_ROOT}/vpx_util/vpx_write_yuv_frame.c)
set(libvpx_srcs_generic_assembly)

set(libvpx_cflags
    # libvpx heavily relies on implicit enum casting.
    -Wno-conversion
    # libvpx does `if ((a == b))` in some places.
    -Wno-parentheses-equality
    # libvpx has many static functions in header, which trigger this warning.
    -Wno-unused-function)

if(DARWIN_AARCH64)
  set(libvpx_includes ${VPX_ROOT}/../config
                   ${VPX_ROOT}/../config/linux/arm64-highbd ${VPX_ROOT})
  set(libvpx_sources ${libvpx_srcs_arm64_highbd})
elseif(LINUX_AARCH64)
  set(libvpx_includes ${VPX_ROOT}/../config ${VPX_ROOT}/../config/linux/arm64
                   ${VPX_ROOT})

  set(libvpx_sources ${libvpx_srcs_arm64})
else()
  set(libvpx_includes ${VPX_ROOT}/../config ${VPX_ROOT}/../config/linux/x64
                   ${VPX_ROOT})

  if(DARWIN_X86_64)
    set(libvpx_cflags ${libvpx_cflags} -fno-common)
  endif()
  if(WINDOWS_MSVC_X86_64)
    set(libvpx_includes ${VPX_ROOT}/../config ${VPX_ROOT}/../config/win/x64
                     ${VPX_ROOT})
  endif()

  android_nasm_compile(
    TARGET libvpx-asm
    LICENSE "BSD-3-Clause"
    NOTICE "REPO/NOTICE"
    REPO "${ANDROID_QEMU2_TOP_DIR}/../libvpx"
         URL
         "https://android.googlesource.com/platform/external/libvpx/+/refs/heads/emu-master-dev"
    INCLUDES ${libvpx_includes}
    SRC ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_assembly})
  set(libvpx_asm libvpx-asm)

  set(libvpx_sources
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_avx2}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_avx512}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_avx}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_mmx}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_sse2}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_sse4_1}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_ssse3}
      ${libvpx_srcs_x86_64})

  # We need to set the proper compiler flags for a subset of files.
  # You cannot do this globally, as the compiler will make the lib unusable.
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_mmx} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS
                                                                   -mmmx)
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_sse2}
                              PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -msse2)
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_ssse3}
                              PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -mssse3)
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_sse4_1}
                              PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -msse4.1)
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_avx}
                                PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -mavx)
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_avx2}
                                PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -mavx2)
  set_source_files_properties(${libvpx_srcs_x86_64_avx512}
      PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -mavx512f -mavx512cd -mavx512bw -mavx512dq
                                                               -mavx512vl)
endif()

android_add_library(
  TARGET libvpx
  LICENSE "BSD-3-Clause"
  NOTICE "REPO/NOTICE"
  REPO "${ANDROID_QEMU2_TOP_DIR}/../libvpx"
       URL
       "https://android.googlesource.com/platform/external/libvpx/+/refs/heads/emu-master-dev"
  SRC # cmake-format: sortable
      ${libvpx_sources})

target_include_directories(libvpx PUBLIC ${VPX_ROOT} PRIVATE ${libvpx_includes})
target_link_libraries(libvpx PRIVATE webrtc-yuv ${libvpx_asm})
